content:
Rather than running around in circles myself,
I believe in leaving professional matters to professionals,
so I'll leave the site selection in your capable hands.

Once you've chosen the perfect spot,
I shall invite Sani to join us in pitching the tent!

Perhaps I know many paths through the starlit sky,
Perhaps I'm versed in all manner of mystical arts,

But when it comes to choosing an address to call home,
I'm still completely lost.

Feel free to make your choice,
I trust your judgment.
